title: Comida Rapida Vegana - Barrio Gustavo Restrepo
typeOfFood: Vegan, Western, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out, Colombian
description: Vegan fast food delivery expanded into 2 Bogota restaurants in Jan 2015. This outlet offers breakfast, lunch set, fast food, a la carte menu, plus a retail area. Makes international dishes and vegan versions of Colombian food; fast food such as empanadas, tamales, burgers, and lasagna. Sells mock meat, plant milk, sweets, body products. Menu is available on its facebook. Delivers in biodegradable packages. Profits fund animal care.
